Dollar42 is a blog by Dollar 42, LLC, a tax advising firm.

Dollar42 publishes content on sensible financial decision making, while acknowledging that personal financial is _highly personal_ and will necessarily vary between different individuals.

[Andy Lindeman, EA](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andylindeman/) is the owner of Dollar 42, LLC and editor of the Dollar42 blog. Dollar 42, LLC offers paid consulting engagements for tax projections and certain other tax advice. Andy has experience with U.S. personal income tax, equity (stock) compensation, retirement accounts, investment income and certain small business issues.

:::{.callout-note}
